items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates personalized product suggestions for logged-in users based on past interactions.
Recommendations update in real-time as user behavior changes.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 80% relevance score in A/B testing.
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent recommendation requests.
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

notes: Assumed that the platform already exists and the requirement is to add AI-powered recommendations. No details provided on specific AI algorithms or data sources; these will need to be defined.
